alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia; Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Ulster; Western Dutchess (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 8:19PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Ulster, central Dutchess and south central Columbia Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 819 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Staatsburg, or near Rhinebeck, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Poughkeepsie, Kingston, New Paltz, Rhinebeck, Hyde Park, Pleasant Valley, Hurley, Amenia, Highland, Pine Plains, Millbrook, Millerton, Stanfordville, Tillson, Port Ewen, Fairview, Staatsburg, Dover Plains, Lloyd and Esopus. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 18 and 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Columbia; Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Ulster; Western Dutchess
